content: पूरः [पूर्-क] {@--1@} Filling, making full. {@--2@} Satisfying, pleasing, making content. {@--3@} Pouring in, supplying; अतैलपूराः सुरतप्रदीपाः <ls>Ku. 1. 10.</ls> {@--4@} The swelling or rising of a river or of the sea, flood; <ls>R. 3. 17.</ls> {@--5@} A stream or flood in general; अंबु° ब ष्प°, शोणित° &c. {@--6@} A piece of water, lake, pond. {@--7@} The healing or cleansing of wounds. {@--8@} A kind of cake. {@--9@} Drawing in breath slowly through the nose. {@--10@} The citron tree. --रं A kind of incense
